title: Actions
disclaimer: Changes you make to your report are saved automatically to your browser's local storage, hence your information is completely secure.

importExport.heading: Import/Export
importExport.body: You can import or export your data in JSON format. With this, you can edit and print your report from any device. Save this file for later use.

printReport.heading: Print Your Report
printReport.body: You can simply press <1>Cmd/Ctrl + P</1> at any time while you're in the app to print your report, but here's a fancy button to do the same thing, just 'cause.

loadDummyData.heading: Load Dummy Data
loadDummyData.body: Unclear on what to do with a fresh blank page? Load some dummy data with prepopulated values to see how a report should look and you can start editing from there.

reset.heading: Reset Everything!
reset.body: This action will reset all your data and remove backups made to your browser's local storage as well, so please make sure you have exported your information before you reset everything.
